info.synopsis: Regression test for multiple input files.
info.description: Test case for processing multiple input files: data for a single run can be gathered from an arbitrary number of files.

parameter.name: CPU_load
parameter.synopsis: Load of the CPU when processing this message transmission

result.name: T_pp
result.synopsis: Ping-pong message latency (halve of roundtrip time)
